text: Aegires gracilis is a species of sea slug, a nudibranch, a marine, opisthobranch gastropod mollusc in the family Aegiridae.Bouchet, P. (2010). Aegires gracilis Garcia, Troncoso & Dominguez, 2002. In: MolluscaBase (2017). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species on 2017-04-24. ==Distribution== This species was described from the Caribbean Sea coast of Costa Rica. ==References== Category:Aegiridae Category:Gastropods described in 2015
title: Aegires gracilis
